verses.verse: Now it came <S%H1961><s%> to pass, as David <S%H1732><s%> sat <S%H3427><s%> in his house, <S%H1004><s%> that David <S%H1732><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Nathan <S%H5416><s%> the prophet, <S%H5030><s%> See, <S%H2009><s%> I dwell <S%H3427><s%> in an house <S%H1004><s%> of cedars, <S%H730><s%> but the ark <S%H727><s%> of the covenant <S%H1285><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> remains under <S%H8478><s%> curtains. <S%H3407><s%>
Then Nathan <S%H5416><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to David, <S%H1732><s%> Do <S%H6213><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> that is in your heart; <S%H3824><s%> for God <S%H430><s%> is with you.
And it came <S%H1961><s%> to pass the same <S%H1931><s%> night, <S%H3915><s%> that the word <S%H1697><s%> of God <S%H430><s%> came <S%H1961><s%> to Nathan, <S%H5416><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

Go <S%H3212><s%> and tell <S%H559><s%> David <S%H1732><s%> my servant, <S%H5650><s%> Thus <S%H3541><s%> said <S%H559><s%> the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> You shall not build <S%H1129><s%> me an house <S%H1004><s%> to dwell <S%H3427><s%> in:

For I have not dwelled <S%H3427><s%> in an house <S%H1004><s%> since <S%H4480><s%> the day <S%H3117><s%> that I brought <S%H5927><s%> up Israel <S%H3478><s%> to this <S%H2088><s%> day; <S%H3117><s%> but have gone <S%H1961><s%> from tent <S%H168><s%> to tent, <S%H168><s%> and from one tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> to another.

Wherever <S%H3605><s%> <S%H834><s%> I have walked <S%H1980><s%> with all <S%H3605><s%> Israel, <S%H3478><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> I a word <S%H1697><s%> to any <S%H259><s%> of the judges <S%H8199><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> whom <S%H834><s%> I commanded <S%H6680><s%> to feed <S%H7462><s%> my people, <S%H5971><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> Why <S%H4100><s%> have you not built <S%H1129><s%> me an house <S%H1004><s%> of cedars? <S%H730><s%>

Now <S%H6258><s%> therefore thus <S%H3541><s%> shall you say <S%H559><s%> to my servant <S%H5650><s%> David, <S%H1732><s%> Thus <S%H3541><s%> said <S%H559><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> of hosts, <S%H6635><s%> I took <S%H3947><s%> you from the sheepcote, <S%H5116><s%> even from following <S%H310><s%> the sheep, <S%H6629><s%> that you should be ruler <S%H5057><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> my people <S%H5971><s%> Israel: <S%H3478><s%>

And I have been <S%H1961><s%> with you wherever <S%H3605><s%> <S%H834><s%> you have walked, and have cut <S%H3772><s%> off all <S%H3605><s%> your enemies <S%H341><s%> from before <S%H6440><s%> you, and have made <S%H6213><s%> you a name <S%H8034><s%> like the name <S%H8034><s%> of the great <S%H1419><s%> men that are in the earth. <S%H776><s%>

Also I will ordain <S%H7760><s%> a place <S%H4725><s%> for my people <S%H5971><s%> Israel, <S%H3478><s%> and will plant <S%H5193><s%> them, and they shall dwell <S%H7931><s%> in their place, <S%H8478><s%> and shall be moved <S%H7264><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> more; <S%H5750><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> shall the children <S%H1121><s%> of wickedness <S%H5766><s%> waste <S%H1086><s%> them any more, <S%H3254><s%> as at the beginning, <S%H7223><s%>

And since the time <S%H3117><s%> that I commanded <S%H6680><s%> judges <S%H8199><s%> to be over <S%H5921><s%> my people <S%H5971><s%> Israel. <S%H3478><s%> Moreover I will subdue <S%H3665><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> your enemies. <S%H341><s%> Furthermore I tell <S%H5046><s%> you that the LORD <S%H3068><s%> will build <S%H1129><s%> you an house. <S%H1004><s%>

And it shall come <S%H1961><s%> to pass, when <S%H3588><s%> your days <S%H3117><s%> be expired <S%H4390><s%> that you must go <S%H3212><s%> to be with your fathers, <S%H1><s%> that I will raise <S%H6965><s%> up your seed <S%H2233><s%> after <S%H310><s%> you, which <S%H834><s%> shall be of your sons; <S%H1121><s%> and I will establish <S%H3559><s%> his kingdom. <S%H4438><s%>
He shall build <S%H1129><s%> me an house, <S%H1004><s%> and I will establish <S%H3559><s%> his throne <S%H3678><s%> for ever. <S%H5769><s%>

I will be his father, <S%H25><s%> and he shall be my son: <S%H1121><s%> and I will not take <S%H5493><s%> my mercy <S%H2617><s%> away <S%H5493><s%> from him, as I took <S%H5493><s%> it from him that was before <S%H6440><s%> you:

But I will settle <S%H5975><s%> him in my house <S%H1004><s%> and in my kingdom <S%H4438><s%> for ever: <S%H5769><s%> and his throne <S%H3678><s%> shall be established <S%H3559><s%> for ever more. <S%H5769><s%>

According to all <S%H3605><s%> these <S%H428><s%> words, <S%H1697><s%> and according to all <S%H3605><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> vision, <S%H2377><s%> so <S%H3651><s%> did Nathan <S%H5416><s%> speak <S%H1696><s%> to David. <S%H1732><s%>

And David <S%H1732><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> came <S%H935><s%> and sat <S%H3427><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> Who <S%H4310><s%> am I, O LORD <S%H3068><s%> God, <S%H430><s%> and what <S%H4310><s%> is my house, <S%H1004><s%> that you have brought <S%H935><s%> me till now? <S%H1988><s%>

And yet this <S%H2063><s%> was a small <S%H6994><s%> thing in your eyes, <S%H5869><s%> O God; <S%H430><s%> for you have also spoken <S%H1696><s%> of your servant's <S%H5650><s%> house <S%H1004><s%> for a great <S%H7350><s%> while to come, and have regarded <S%H7200><s%> me according to the estate <S%H8448><s%> of a man <S%H120><s%> of high <S%H4608><s%> degree, O LORD <S%H3068><s%> God. <S%H430><s%>

What <S%H4100><s%> can David <S%H1732><s%> speak more <S%H3254><s%> <S%H5750><s%> to you for the honor <S%H3519><s%> of your servant? <S%H5650><s%> for you know <S%H3045><s%> your servant. <S%H5650><s%>

O LORD, <S%H3068><s%> for your servant's <S%H5650><s%> sake, <S%H5668><s%> and according to your own heart, <S%H3820><s%> have you done <S%H6213><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> this <S%H2063><s%> greatness, <S%H1420><s%> in making known <S%H3045><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> these great <S%H1420><s%> things.

O LORD, <S%H3068><s%> there is none <S%H369><s%> like <S%H3644><s%> you, neither <S%H369><s%> is there any God <S%H430><s%> beside <S%H2108><s%> you, according to all <S%H3605><s%> that we have heard <S%H8085><s%> with our ears. <S%H241><s%>

And what <S%H4310><s%> one <S%H259><s%> nation <S%H1471><s%> in the earth <S%H776><s%> is like your people <S%H5971><s%> Israel, <S%H3478><s%> whom <S%H834><s%> God <S%H430><s%> went <S%H1980><s%> to redeem <S%H6299><s%> to be his own people, <S%H5971><s%> to make <S%H7760><s%> you a name <S%H8034><s%> of greatness <S%H1420><s%> and terribleness, <S%H3372><s%> by driving <S%H1644><s%> out nations <S%H1471><s%> from before <S%H6440><s%> your people <S%H5971><s%>whom <S%H834><s%> you have redeemed <S%H6299><s%> out of Egypt? <S%H4714><s%>

For your people <S%H5971><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%> did you make <S%H5414><s%> your own people <S%H5971><s%> for ever; <S%H5769><s%> and you, LORD, <S%H3068><s%> became <S%H1961><s%> their God. <S%H430><s%>

Therefore now, <S%H6258><s%> LORD, <S%H3068><s%> let the thing <S%H1697><s%> that you have spoken <S%H1696><s%> concerning <S%H5921><s%> your servant <S%H5650><s%> and concerning <S%H5921><s%> his house <S%H1004><s%> be established <S%H539><s%> for ever, <S%H5769><s%> and do <S%H6213><s%> as you have said. <S%H1696><s%>

Let it even be established, <S%H539><s%> that your name <S%H8034><s%> may be magnified <S%H1431><s%> for ever, <S%H5769><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> The LORD <S%H3068><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%> is the God <S%H430><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> even a God <S%H430><s%> to Israel: <S%H3478><s%> and let the house <S%H1004><s%> of David <S%H1732><s%> your servant <S%H5650><s%> be established <S%H3559><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> you.

For you, O my God, <S%H430><s%> have told <S%H1540><s%> your servant <S%H5650><s%> that you will build <S%H1129><s%> him an house: <S%H1004><s%> therefore <S%H5921><s%> <S%H3651><s%> your servant <S%H5650><s%> has found <S%H4672><s%> in his heart <S%H3820><s%> to pray <S%H6419><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> you.
And now, <S%H6258><s%> LORD, <S%H3068><s%> you are God, <S%H430><s%> and have promised <S%H1696><s%> this <S%H2063><s%> goodness <S%H2896><s%> to your servant: <S%H5650><s%>

Now <S%H6258><s%> therefore let it please <S%H2974><s%> you to bless <S%H1288><s%> the house <S%H1004><s%> of your servant, <S%H5650><s%> that it may be before <S%H6440><s%> you for ever: <S%H5769><s%> for you bless, <S%H1288><s%> O LORD, <S%H3068><s%> and it shall be blessed <S%H1288><s%> for ever. <S%H5769><s%>
